body:
Comment 5: 
anta40, it does make it clearer. As far as I know there is nothing that can be stripped
from Go executable. Don't do it.

It is unfortunate that strip removes some sections from Go exe without any hesitation. 

It removes all dwarf sections and also symbol table offsets from pe-header. Perhaps
something can be done to make whatever remains run. But I don't think it is acceptable
in any circumstances.

Leaving for others to decide what to do.

Alex
_Labels changed: added **os-windows**._
